select.if: select idx as category_idx, name, image from category where idx < 4
select idx as category2_idx, category_idx, name2, image from category2 where idx < 5
select idx as category2_idx, category_idx, name2, image from category2 where idx > 4 and idx < 8
select idx as category2_idx, category_idx, name2, image from category2 where idx > 7 and idx < 10

mapper.select: select idx, name2 from category2 where category_idx < 4
select idx as category2_idx, name2 from category2 where idx < 10;
select idx as category3_idx, name3 from category3 order by idx asc

select g1.title, g1.price, g1.board_idx, g1.category3_idx, g1.category2_idx, g1.state, g1.status, b.like_count, b.email, (select full_name from file_list where board_idx = b.idx limit 1) as full_name from game g1, board b, category2 c2 where b.idx = g1.board_idx and g1.category2_idx = c2.idx and c2.idx = #{category2Idx} and g1.category3_idx = #{category3Idx} order by g1.idx desc
